items.name: Agent
items.message: Hello, this is Sarah from GreenFin Recovery. I’m calling regarding your past-due balance of $1,245. Do you have a moment to discuss this?

items.name: Customer
items.message: Yeah, I already told you people to stop calling me. I’m not paying a damn thing.

items.name: Agent
items.message: I understand you’re frustrated. I just want to make sure you’re aware of the outstanding balance before any further steps are taken.

items.name: Customer
items.message: Yeah well maybe your company should’ve thought about that before screwing me over. Don’t expect anything from me.

items.name: Agent
items.message: I hear you. If there’s an issue you’d like to dispute, I can help route this to our support team. Would you like to do that now?

items.name: Customer
items.message: What I want is for you to stop wasting my time. This is harassment.

config.prompt: Two colleagues discussing the new GPT-4o model
config.outline:
1. GPT-4o release
2. Multimodal features
3. Use cases.
4. Integration into voice assistant.
